subject: Steve's Box #44 For Sale on Ebay
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Any questions, just ask me.  I don't sell many on Ebay, but i thought i would target a bigger audience this way.

This is my newest radio and it really works well, but i need some money to continue to buy more radios.

Here is the link to the auction:

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=140513382514


-Steve H.
